body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Slim-Fit Short-Sleeve V-Neck T-Shirt, Pack of 2
features: SLIM FIT: Close fit that hugs the body.

COTTON MODAL MICRO RIB: Super soft cotton modal micro rib jersey with added stretch offers all-day ease and comfort, while retaining its shape for the perfect slim fit. Fabric you want to live in year round.

ESSENTIAL T-SHIRT: This versatile t-shirt is a classic wardrobe essential, perfect layered under your favorite jacket or cardigan or wear on its own styled back to Amazon Essentials Women's Denim and Slip-on Sneakers.
DETAILS: Features a classic v-neck and short sleeves for casual and effortless style.
body.description: We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family. Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really nice!! Very high quality at a good price! They are more fitted, which I love. The material is great!!! Soft and comfortable, has some stretch, washes well, good color, not sheer or see through. Really nice. Nice enough to go under a jacket or blazer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Material is Much Softer then Hanes
reviews.reviewText: Since I love the comfort of t shirts decided to buy Amazon vs Hanes. Found Amazon'd shirts to be softer and stretchier than Hanes. Price is comparable. The blue color is very flattering. And both work well as stand alone or under clothes. My preference is the Amazon. It feels a lot more comfortable. As for washing, both brands wash up nicely and come out of the dryer without wrinkles and ready to wear. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don't believe reviews saying it fits tight
reviews.reviewText: These t shirts are both quite long and quite large. At over 5'10", that works fairly well for me, though.I had read in some reviews that they were quite form-fitting, so I ordered an XL, which seemed to fit my measurements as well according to the chart. I guess they aren't hanging off me, but they are definitely on the loose side given that they are rib knit, and the shoulders are large, whereas I have a rather athletic build. Probably not a good choice for someone with a larger tummy, as I often find tops are tight in the shoulders and hang several inches behind me in the back. This style has perhaps an extra half inch in the shoulders and a half inch to an inch down the sides of my waist, so I assume (unless you want it figure-hugging, in which case you're fine, just buy a smaller size) that it is cut more for an athletic V or a straight-ish H figure.They have a nice thickness to them and the fabric looks good. I purchased black and royal blue, so I can't really speak to transparency; these dark shades are completely opaque! I love the blue. It's a gorgeous shade that brightens my face and yet is easy to wear. I'm the sort of person who looks good in jewel tones, but I don't like huge contrasts and I don't feel comfortable in head-to-toe colour. The blue will work with both my print skirts and should look good with blue or black jeans without a screaming contrast.Before closing, I guess I should mention that there were no flaws, no threads hanging off. Another thing that may be of interest is that the V isn't very pointy. It's a little bit wide and doesn't come to a sharp point. I probably should have got a smaller size so my shoulders would have pulled it out and made the neck more open. It probably would have looked better, as it isn't very deep on me; I feel like perhaps the t shirt is meant to be pulled taut on the body, but that is not my case. Looks like good quality, though (I haven't washed it yet). And I do like the colours I chose. Wish I had gone down at least one size and chosen more colours, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great T for layering
reviews.reviewText: Such a great value. The black is a true black. Fit is good. Soft and stretchy. Booth these to layer under a flannel. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect basic wardrobe staple!
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered these in different colors - they are a wonderful addition to your collection if you appreciate well-made basic pieces that you tend to wear over and over again. I have worn them a lot and haven't noticed any shrinking, even after multiple washes. They are long enough to tuck into my pants and they stay tucked in. They are flattering too!For reference, I am 5'4" and weigh 115 lbs. I am a 32D. I initially ordered small, but returned them and got the mediums. The small was too tight around my chest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars completely different form the cotton regular fit
reviews.reviewText: very sheer, stretchy and tight fitting, V opening is huge. prefer the fit of the regular cotton cut.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised by Amazon Essentials clothing!
reviews.reviewText: Aside from a pair of summer pajamas for my daughter, I hadn't really considered buying Amazon's clothing line. In my mind, I was expecting low quality. I was proven wrong in a great way.I ordered a pair of the Slim Fit short sleeve women's V-Neck tees in black. I've had some health problems and lost a substantial amount of weight, hence the need for some new shirts. Clothes shopping in person is an exercise in frustration. I have a long torso and equally long arms, so clothes are NEVER the right length. Plus I always feel ripped off- what I purchase NEVER holds up. And I launder CAREFULLY.Imagine my surprise when I tried on the tees, and they were LONG ENOUGH. Length is important! I live and work on a farm, and I NEED my shirts to be long. It prevents hay/feed/wood shavings from getting down the back of my pants. I also have a small market garden, and there is NOTHING more frustrating AND painful than sunburning your lower back because your shirt was too short to keep the sun off while tending crops. These shirts are the FIRST in ages that are ACTUALLY LONG ENOUGH. And I LOVE the slim fit, because they sit close to the body- no snagging them on gates/hooks, safer to wear around machinery. Major points right there.So the shirts fit great, and the fabric is substantial without being too heavy or too light (for me at least). The next concern I had was "How are these going to wash up?" So I washed them inside out in cold water on a regular cycle, and hung them to air dry. After drying, I inspected them carefully. No annoying pinholes, no seams let go, retained shape. Looking even better!Over the past few weeks, I've washed and worn the tees MULTIPLE times a week. They're still fitting great, no fading, no weird pinholes, are retaining their shape. And I've worn them in the fields, in the barn for chores, for MANUAL labor. And they're incredibly comfortable to boot! So I'm REALLY starting to like these shirts!One last thing that sold me on these shirts: The last time I laundered both tees, I missed one coming out of the washer and accidentally ran it through the dryer on medium heat. When I realized what I'd done, I was POSITIVE that the shirt that went through the dryer was going to have shrunk measurably. After the line-dried tee was completely dry, I laid them on top of one another, and compared them. ABSOLUTELY NO CHANGE. Not in size, color, shape, or texture of the fabric. (To be on the safe side, I plan to continue line drying these shirts because I like them so much and want them to last!)Final thoughts:You got me, Amazon. You hooked me in with a 2 pack of tees. I liked them SO much, that last week I ordered a 2 pack of white tees, and a 2 pack of blue/aqua tees. I now have enough shirts to make it through a week of work. And if most of the colors weren't sold out right now, I'd buy more. But I don't like the available colors. I'm really hoping they restock these and keep the cut/fit, because these could easily become my go-to tee.I also see that Amazon has a listing for a slim fit, LONG sleeve tee. It may be summer now, but Wisconsin winter is just around the corner. Those long sleeve tees look like JUST the thing to layer under insulated coveralls and a flannel for winter work. I will be keeping an eye on those, and if they come back in stock, I plan on grabbing a week's worth of those too!As always, I will update my review if anything changes with the product. I will probably update my review and note the date that they start to show signs of serious wear/weird holes/seams fail, just so other customers can get an idea of how long these shirts last for someone who's using them daily and heavily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect shirt! Length is perfect (about mid hip on me) and sleeve length is perfect too (not super short like other women's shirts). The shirt is very flattering and hugs in all the right places. I usually wear a large (size 12/14) but I got an XL and it's just right, not overly clingy but also not overly loose. I just bought 4 more in different colors.
La tela es genial, las pedí talla M y si cumple con el size chart, no transparenta mucho. Pediré más para complementar los básico
Soft material and true to size

Ich würde diese Shirts wieder bestellen. Man braucht sie nicht nicht zu bügeln, sie sind schön weich, sitzen gut und haben eine tolle Länge.Ich habe die Größe L bestellt und sie passt perfekt: 172 cm und 66 kg
j'avais pris une taille au dessus pour plus de sûreté or ma taille aurai suffit, mais pas grave ils sont très confortable donc j'ai gardé et même acheté 2 supplémentaires dans couleur différente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I sized up a little as I didn’t want these to stretch across front. I’m about a size 10/12 and ordered medium. They’re perfect. Love the colours and they wash well with absolutely minimum ironing😀.
